amendatorysection.catchline: Graded Egg Fund; created; use; investment.
amendatorysection.para: The proceeds of license and inspection fees shall be remitted to the State Treasurer for credit to the Graded Egg Fund which is hereby created. Such fund shall be used by the department to aid in defraying the expenses of administering the Nebraska Graded Egg Act. Any money in the fund available for investment shall be invested by the state investment officer pursuant to the Nebraska Capital Expansion Act and the Nebraska State Funds Investment Act.

crossreference.para: Nebraska Capital Expansion Act, see section 72-1269.
Nebraska State Funds Investment Act, see section 72-1260.
